instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3437-a Works on charger but doesn't recognize battery
threads.message: I have an 820-3437-a macbook air that works just fine off the charger but will not recognize the battery, I have tried a new battery but still the same result. R5380 reads 5 ohms on the board, but the correct 2k ohms off the board. I get .0034 in diode mode on the smbus_smc_5_g3_sda line. any help would be great, thanks

threads.title: 820-3437-a Works on charger but doesn't recognize battery
threads.message: Remove U7100 and check if you get a higher value in diode mode on SMBUS_SMC_5_G3_SDA line, if yes, just replace U7100, if don't the next suspect is SMC.....

threads.title: 820-3437-a Works on charger but doesn't recognize battery
threads.message: removed U7100 still get the same .0033 to ground in diode mode.. is there anywhere i can get a stencil for the smc?

threads.title: 820-3437-a Works on charger but doesn't recognize battery
820-3437-a Works on charger but doesn't recognize battery
threads.message: I put a new smc on the board and am no longer getting the short to ground on the data line but now i get no light on the charger and when i plug it in the fan runs full speed. the computer trys to boot but fails and gives me a bunch of lines of code on the left side of the screen then takes me to a screen that says to try booting again. Did i buy an smc with no programming?

threads.title: 820-3437-a Works on charger but doesn't recognize battery
820-3437-a Works on charger but doesn't recognize battery
threads.message: Where did you buy the SMC???  Link?

threads.message: i bought 10pcs there and none worked.... The seller dont know if those ic came from a donor board or from where...

threads.title: 820-3437-a Works on charger but doesn't recognize battery
threads.message: okay so you think the ic is junk.

threads.title: 820-3437-a Works on charger but doesn't recognize battery
threads.message: Uhm you bought a random SMC chip. These chips are unique to each board type. You need to get an identical donor board and take the SMC from there.
